channel.title: Whonix 12.0.0.3.2 no keepassx?
channel.description:
Sorry, but I can't find the original thread where @Patrick was looking for testers for 12.0.0.3.2. Well I am testing it and I've noticed keepassx is no longer installed by default in the workstation.
Was keepassx removed intentionally? Security related?

item.title: Whonix 12.0.0.3.2 no keepassx?
item.dc:creator: qubenix
item.description:
I did see that page, and the forum post. I just thought it was strange that the discussion ended on April 2014, but the change is just now being made. Especially since there’s new activity on KeePassX as of September 2015: https://www.keepassx.org/news/2015/09/514.

Furthermore, the bug report you mentioned there has been closed by debian since KeePassX 2.0~beta1-1 is in experimental repo now: https://packages.debian.org/experimental/keepassx.

Read full topic

item.title: Whonix 12.0.0.3.2 no keepassx?
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Package fpm2 is installed by default.

The rationale behind this change is archived in the wiki which also links to a forum post that discusses why we did this:
https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Dev/Password_Manager

Read full topic
